text: The Agonizing Last Words of Programmer Bill ZellerI felt compelled to post this here after reading it  I do not mean to post this as a defense of his decision  but rather as something to learn from  He never shared his abuse with others and felt betrayed by those who shared some of the private things he told them Having recently had some moments of wanting it all to end  this story really hit me  and I want to share it so that others will reach out  I feel that far too often those of us who are depressed and or suicidal feel we are perceived as far more of a negative influence than we actually are   So to those of you who want to end it all  please reach out  You are not the only one who has faced the issues you are facing  Your situation is unique  of course  but it is not impossible
summary: Programmer Bill Zeller committed suicide. He never shared his abuse with others and felt betrayed by those who shared some of the private things he told them. He had some moments of wanting it all to end. He wants to share his story so that others will reach out.
cleaned: programmer bill seller commit suicide share abuse feel betray share private thing tell moment want end want share story reach

text: What are you supposed to do when you re tired of talking I ve been suicidal ever since the time I almost attempted in    Anyone who s lived with this knows what it s like   It feels like being an alcoholic but instead ideations of self harm are the drug I can t escape im self aware enough to know it s important to talk to someone when you re like this  so I do   I talk to friends and loved ones who have a hard time understanding what I m feeling but they mean well   But increasingly when I get in a bad way I get less hesitant to talk with people   It s like I ve rung that bell too many times   I m afraid I m just wearing them down with my negativity and soon anyone who cares will run away from me   I wouldn t blame them So now here I am wanting to kill myself  felling like its a lot less of a matter of if but rather when  and I m tired of talking   I m tired of looking for a sympathetic ear or a shoulder to cry on   I feel like anything I could say has already been said   Everyone s seen this episode a billion times and it s played out So what the hell do you do when talking to people no longer accomplishes anything
summary: Suicide is the drug I can't escape. I have been suicidal ever since the time I almost attempted to kill myself. I talk to friends and loved ones when I'm in a bad way, but I'm tired of talking and I don't know what to do.

text: I feel hopeless  It s not rational  but I can t imagine getting better I ve never posted on reddit before  but I don t know where else to go I m a  yr old woman who recently graduated from college  despite not thinking I d make it  I finished my thesis  peer taught a course  worked  etc  Now I have a   job at a major non profit I ve been severely depressed since high school  I ve attempted suicide once  and I think about it every day  The only thing stopping me is not wanting to put my parents and brothers through it  Over the past year I ve developed a major drinking problem  I drink at least between a bottle of wine and a pint of gin a night  I m usually hungover at work  I ve gone to the hospital for alcohol poisoning a number times  I broke my arm because I fell down the stairs drunk  I ve gotten behind the wheel  went to court for being publicly intoxicated  and I often self harm when I m drunk   I told my family I was becoming sober over a month ago  all the while continuing to drink every night  I ve been living with my father  and today he found all the bottles in my room while I was at work  He said they filled a trash bag  and that was just from the past   weeks of me living here  He s pissed and worried  called my mom  they re divorced  she s pissed and worried  I m embarrassed and ashamed but I also don t want to stop drinking   A big factor here is that I ve been off my meds for over a month  I hadn t been going to my psychiatrist for a long time because I don t have motivation to do anything  and I just don t want to see her  but she won t prescribe my meds again until I do  I ve set an appointment for this Monday  I know being back on meds will help a bit with things  but I also know I ve never felt right or like I m made to be alive   I don t know if anyone will read this all  but I don t know what to do  I just feel like there s no hope for me
summary: A woman has been depressed since high school and she's been drinking a lot. She's been off her meds for over a month and she hasn't been going to her psychiatrist for a long time. She has an appointment with her psychiatrist this Monday.
